channel.title: The Hon. Bob McDonnell
channel.description: The Hon. Bob McDonnell Governor of Virginia

item.title: "The times call for new leadership to get this great nation out of debt and back to work.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: The choice is clear: the status quo of the entitlement society, or dynamic change to an opportunity society.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: We need a President who will say to a small businesswoman: congratulations, we applaud your success, you did make that happen, you did build that!
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: Big government didn't build America: You built America!
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: Small businesses don't come out of Washington D.C. pre-made on flat bed trucks.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: That coffee shop in Henrico; that florist in Virginia Beach....that bakery in Radford...they were all built by entrepreneurial Americans with big dreams....not a big spending government with a wide open wallet full of other people's money!"
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: "Conservative fiscal policies are working, and so are more Americans in states with Republican governors.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: Now, just think what we can do if we had a President who would support us, not obstruct us.
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: Someone who has created jobs in the private sector, who understands the economy, and who has actually balanced a budget....or heck, for that matter, who has actually passed a budget! We need President Mitt Romney!
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell

item.title: When Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan get to work with Susana Martinez...Scott Walker...John Kasich ....Terry Branstad and governors from both parties across this country, we will get people back to work!"
item.author: The Hon. Bob McDonnell
